View this post on Instagram
It is always a pleasure to host our favorite couple at NUEVA. ♥️ . . Happy Valentine’s Day everyone! . . #VirushkaAtNueva #NuevaWorld #SangamCourtyard #viratkohli #anushkasharma
A post shared by Nueva Bar & Dining (@nueva.world) on Feb 14, 2019 at 1:09am PST
title: Twining In Black, Virat Kohli & Anushka Sharma Walk Hand-In-Hand As They Return To Mumbai Post Valentine’s Day
description: After celebrating Valentine’s Day in Delhi, the much-loved celebrity couple, Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma have returned to Mumbai. Engrossed in a conversation, Virushka, as they are fondly called, walked hand-in-hand as they were snapped at the airport.
